description: shows drive c running in Ubuntu? Shows fake Windows dir's and a few program files
windows file manager that runs through WINE, doesn't recognize ext4 file system, in a repository? seriously?!
summary: windows app, not usable for linux partitions

description: Aimed to work with Widows File Systems and its patition assignation. It suggests to open drives D:\ F:\ and so on, but doesn't see any Linux drive, It detect only drive C:\ that is virtual one of Wine, and Z:\ that of "\". But it does not allow to enter any folder in so called Z:\ except 'home" or "tmp". As i can understand it doesn't know what is access rights. There are many function to work in Windows like registry editor, which are unnecessary in Linux
summary: Not for Linux. Doesn't work correctly with Linux File System
